WITH CTE_NUM_RX AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY r.PATID, r.CLMID, r.NDC, r.COPAY, r.DEDUCT, r.DISPFEE, r.AVGWHLSL, r.STD_COST, r.DAYS_SUP, r.QUANTITY, r.RFL_NBR, r.MAIL_IND, r.DEA, r.NPI, r.Pat_PlanId) ROW_NUM, r.clmid, r.patid AS PERSON_ID, r.fill_dt AS DRUG_EXOSURE_START_DATE, r.quantity AS QUANTITY, r.days_sup AS DAYS_SUPPLY, r.ndc AS DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, r.copay, r.std_cost, r.deduct, r.dispfee, r.avgwhlsl, r.dea, r.npi, r.rfl_nbr, r.mail_ind, r.mail_ind AS ORIGINAL_MAIL_IND, r.Pat_PlanId FROM RX r JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND r.patid = ch.PERSON_ID ) , CTE_LAST_RECORD AS ( SELECT z.* FROM CTE_NUM_RX z JOIN ( SELECT r.PERSON_ID, r.clmid, r.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, MAX(r.ROW_NUM) MAX_ROW_NUM FROM CTE_NUM_RX r GROUP BY r.PERSON_ID, r.clmid, r.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE ) m ON m.PERSON_ID = z.PERSON_ID AND m.clmid = z.clmid AND m.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE = z.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE AND m.MAX_ROW_NUM = z.ROW_NUM ), result as ( SELECT r.PERSON_ID, r.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, r.DRUG_EXOSURE_START_DATE, MAX(rfl_nbr) AS RFL_NBR, SUM(COPAY) AS PAID_COPAY, SUM(DEDUCT) AS PAID_TOWARD_DEDUCTIBLE, SUM(DISPFEE) AS DISPENSING_FEE, SUM(avgwhlsl) AS AVERAGE_WHOLESALE_PRICE, SUM(STD_COST) AS TOTAL_PAID, ROUND(SUM(QUANTITY),0) AS QUANTITY, CASE WHEN MAX(MAIL_IND) = 'Y' THEN '38000176' ELSE '38000175' END AS DRUG_TYPE_CONCEPT_ID, CASE WHEN SUM(DAYS_SUPPLY) < 0 THEN 0 WHEN SUM(DAYS_SUPPLY) > 365 THEN 365 WHEN SUM(DAYS_SUPPLY) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE SUM(DAYS_SUPPLY) END AS DAYS_SUPPLY, ';'+ CASE WHEN MAX(NPI) is not null and MAX(DEA) is not null THEN MAX(NPI)+ '-' + MAX(DEA) ELSE ISNULL(ISNULL(MAX(NPI), MAX(DEA)),9999999) END as ProviderIdKey, Pat_PlanId FROM CTE_LAST_RECORD r GROUP BY r.PERSON_ID, r.DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE, r.DRUG_EXOSURE_START_DATE, r.Pat_PlanId )
select *, SUBSTRING(DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE,1,9) DRUG_SOURCE_VALUE_9 from result ORDER BY PERSON_ID
